> Please add tests for the error messages added

:+1: I added tests for this in the latest commits

> Please add a correctness test; current tests only check the output shape, not whether group convolution has actually taken place.

I looked at the tests for Keras convolutional layers and the `tf.nn` and none of them test the actual correctness of the output. The testing for correctness of the grouped convolution and normal convolutions is already handled on the C++.
I can add a very simple test that checks that this implementation matches a simple loop based version of grouped convolutions. Do you think that would be useful?
